caption: Show Popup
doc: You must select at least 1. You can refer to this documentation : https://www.filestack.com/docs/transformations/ui/web/

ACM.caption: Enable Image Search
ACM.doc: Search for images in the File Picker.
ACM.name: enable_imagesearch

ACQ.caption: Enable Dropbox
ACQ.doc: You will need your own OAuth2 application with Dropbox.
ACQ.name: enable_dropbox

ACR.caption: Enable Unsplash
ACR.doc: Search for free, high quality images from Unsplash community.
ACR.name: enable_unsplash

ACS.caption: Enable Webcam
ACS.doc: Uses device menu on mobile. Not currently supported in Safari and IE.
ACS.name: enable_webcam

ACT.caption: Enable Video
ACT.doc: Uses device menu on mobile. Not currently supported in Safari and IE.
ACT.name: enable_video

ACU.caption: Enable Audio
ACU.doc: Uses device menu on mobile. Not currently supported in Safari and IE.
ACU.name: enable_audio

ACZ.caption: Enable OneDrive Business
ACZ.doc: You will need your own OAuth2 application with OneDrive for Business.
ACZ.name: enable_onedrive_business

ACa.caption: Select wich source can be used
ACa.name: info1

ACb.caption: Select wich file type can be uploaded
ACb.name: info2

ACd.caption: Enable image/jpeg
ACd.doc: any mime type commonly known by browsers
ACd.name: Fenable_jpeg

ACf.caption: Enable video/*
ACf.doc: accept all types of video files
ACf.name: Fenable_video

ACg.caption: Enable audio/*
ACg.doc: accept all types of audio files
ACg.name: Fenable_audio

ACh.caption: Enable application/*
ACh.doc: accept all types of application files
ACh.name: Fenable_application

ACi.caption: Enable text/*
ACi.doc: accept all types of text files
ACi.name: Fenable_text

ACk.caption: Location
ACk.doc: (Optional) FileStack = Nothing ,   Amazon = s3 ,   Google Cloud = gcs ,   Rackspace = rackspace ,   Dropbox = dropbox
ACk.name: location

ACl.caption: Path
ACl.doc: (Optional) Path where to store the file. Usually "/" means the root.
ACl.name: path

ADF.caption: Files Max
ADF.doc: Choose the maximum number of files allowed to upload
ADF.name: maxFiles

ADG.caption: Files Min
ADG.doc: Choose the minimum number of files allowed to upload.
ADG.name: minFiles

ADL.caption: AutoSend MaxFilesReached
ADL.doc: Using this parameter you can choose whether to start uploading automatically when maxFiles is hit.
ADL.name: startuploadingwhenmaxfilesreached

ADN.caption: Disable Transformer
ADN.doc: Using this parameter you can disable abbility to edit images.
ADN.name: disabletransformer

ADO.caption: Disable Thumbnails
ADO.doc: Using this parameter you can disable local image thumbnail previews in the summary screen.
ADO.name: disablethumbnails

ADP.caption: Max Size (KB)
ADP.doc: Maximum size per file in Kilobyte (Enter "0" for unlimited)
ADP.name: maxSize

ADR.caption: Enable ALL
ADR.doc: If set to "Yes" it will accept all file format compatible with Filestack and ignore the enabling bellow. (Option added due to filestack not detecting .m4v as video file)
ADR.name: Fenable_ALL
